title: Bangkok Beauty Show & K-Beauty Expo Bangkok 2022
description: Join us and be part of the largest Southeast Asia Beauty Industry. BANGKOK BEAUTY SHOW is the most promising business-to-business beauty trade show incorporating all aspects of cosmetics, hair, nail, aesthetics, raw materials, packaging, body care, inner beauty supplements, fashion, health, and spa. Especially this year, we look forward to medical services like plastic surgery, dermatology, and dental care. With the unparalleled industry standard platform, you will have the opportunity to launch new products, raise brand awareness, reach thousands of new prospects, and demonstrate company expertise. We confidently recommend Bangkok Beauty Show 2022 to whoever wants to be part of the Southeast Asia Beauty Industry.
ticket: ไม่มีค่าเข้าชม
